If you're a Muslim, you could be detained at the airport as a suspect for further questioning and even a slight suspicion could get you arrested. Racial profiling has been significantly increased post 9/11 and there have been numerous cases of travellers, particularly those of South Asian and Middle Eastern origins, being detained or arrested. A few detainees in the past have even experienced being transferred to another foreign country where they have been denied due process and have even been subjected to torture.
